thread.title: Natasha Hamilton shows off flat stomach in lingerie and says she's "proud" of body after four kids
thread.title_full: Natasha Hamilton shows off flat stomach in lingerie and says she's "proud" of body after four kids

author: Lara Martin
title: Natasha Hamilton shows off flat stomach in lingerie and says she's "proud" of body after four kids
text:
Natasha Hamilton shows off flat stomach in lingerie and says she's "proud" of body after four kids The Atomic Kitten star has been working hard at the gym Share Natasha says she's proud of her post-baby body (Photo: Instagram) Share   
Natasha Hamilton has stripped to her lacy lingerie to show off her gym-honed body after having four kids. 
The Atomic Kitten star posted an intimate underwear photo to Instagram after revealing she’s proud of her appearance after putting in serious “hard work” at the gym. 
Natasha, 34, said: “So, all the hard work is starting to pay off. Proud to have this body after four babies… it takes time and dedication but it’s more than achievable.” 
She went on to say that Atomic Kitten’s recent tour had been the spark for whipping herself into shape. “Going on tour kick started my journey, now looking forward to the summer ahead.” The star uploaded this racy shot to Instagram (Photo: natashahamilton/Instagram) 
Natasha added hashtags including #fitgirls and #stronggirls. 
She was inundated with compliments from fans, praising her appearance and the fact she achieved it through exercise and healthy eating. 
One wrote: “Most women without any kids would be proud to look like that, glad to see you tell people not to starve themselves as food in moderation helps you lose weight.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now
